body: In every place we call emitExpr, we currently only support Tensor types. Eventually when this is no longer true we will refactor this into a emitTensorExpr which calls an emitExpr. I didn't do that mod here since it seemed unnecessary at this point.
body_html: In every place we call emitExpr, we currently only support Tensor types. Eventually when this is no longer true we will refactor this into a emitTensorExpr which calls an emitExpr. I didn't do that mod here since it seemed unnecessary at this point.
body_text: In every place we call emitExpr, we currently only support Tensor types. Eventually when this is no longer true we will refactor this into a emitTensorExpr which calls an emitExpr. I didn't do that mod here since it seemed unnecessary at this point.
